meanings.definition: A Pacific Islander laborer, especially in Australia or New Zealand.
meanings.sent1: The plantation hired kanakas to work in the fields.
meanings.sent2: Kanakas played a significant role in building the railways.
meanings.sent3: The kanakas' laughter echoed through the sugarcane fields.
meanings.sent4: The strength of the kanakas was like that of mighty warriors.
meanings.sent5: The kanakas toiled under the hot sun, their spirits unbroken.
